DisableGeneralDescription: You can later delete or enable the disabled users if needed. Note that you can’t disable users such as the Owner and yourself.
DisableGuestDescription: If you disable this guest, they won’t be able to log in to {{productName}}.
DisableGuestsDescription: If you disable these guests, they won’t be able to log in to {{productName}}.
DisableGuestsGeneralDescription: You can later delete or enable the disabled guests if needed.
DisableUserDescription: If you Disable this user, they won’t be able to log in to {{productName}}, while their documents and data will remain intact.
DisableUsersDescription: If you Disable these users, they won’t be able to log in to {{productName}}, while their documents and data will remain intact.
EnableGuestDescription: If you enable this guest, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again.
EnableGuestsDescription: If you enable these guests, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again.
EnableUserDescription: If you enable this user, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again and access their documents and data.
EnableUsersDescription: If you enable these users, they will be able to log in to {{productName}} again and access their documents and data.
